title: IGNITE-19222 .NET: Add IgniteClientConfiguration.EnableClusterDiscovery
body:
* Add `IgniteClientConfiguration.EnableClusterDiscovery`.
* Allow any combinations of `EnableClusterDiscovery` and `EnablePartitionAwareness`:
  * Only `EnablePartitionAwareness`: use configured endpoints to route requests.
  * Only `EnableClusterDiscovery`: use discovered endpoints for failover, but maintain only one connection.
  * Both enabled: discover all, connect to all.
  * Both disabled: maintain one connection, use only configured endpoints for failover.

title: IGNITE-19164 Improve message about requested partitions during snapshot restore
body:
‚Ä¶ot restore

Currently, during snapshot restore message is logged before requesting partitions from remote nodes:

[2023-03-24T18:06:59,910][INFO ][disco-notifier-worker-#792%node%|#792%node%][SnapshotRestoreProcess] Trying to request partitions from remote nodes [reqId=ff682204-9554-4fbb-804c-38a79c0b286a, snapshot=snapshot_name, map={76e22ef5-3c76-4987-bebd-9a6222a00000={-903566235=[0,2,4,6,11,12,18,98,100,170,190,194,1015], 1544803905=[1,11,17,18,22,25,27,35,37,42,45,51,62,64,67,68,73,76,1017]}}]

It is necessary to make this output "human readable":

Print messages per node instead of one message for all nodes.
